name: Parasect
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: It stays mostly in dark, damp places, the preference not of the bug, but of the big mushrooms on its back.

abilities.name: Allergic Pollen
abilities.effect: As long as Parasect is in play, cards in any player’s discard piles are not affected by attacks or Pokémon Powers. This power stops working if Parasect becomes Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sleep Pinchers
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
